content: Who really puts the presents under the Christmas tree?

As an AI language model, I don't have personal beliefs or experiences, but I can share that in many Christian traditions, it is said that Santa Claus, also known as Saint Nicholas or Father Christmas, brings gifts for children and places them under the Christmas tree on Christmas Eve or early Christmas morning. However, in reality, it is often the parents or other adult family members who put the presents under the tree for their children as part of the holiday tradition.
